original: Perverts! Perverts! Perverts!  That's all this city is made up of - filthy perverts!  Can't people keep to themselves and leave the rest of us alone!  I try not to leave my apartment, but when I do have to go out to get more ammunition, vitamin supplements, or laxative I want to be left in peace.  Sick pervert freaks have tried to engage me in conversation and steal my soul.  They are at these places.  AVOID AT ALL COSTS!
translated: 变态！变态！变态！自由城全是猥琐变态！大家就不能离远点各玩各的吗？除非是不得不去买子弹、维生素和泻药，我已经尽力不出家门了。我就想好好呆着。猥琐变态总会找你搭话，把你的魂勾飞。他们在这些地方。无论如何，一定要小心！

original: Mommy told me not to talk to strangers. Yucky, filthy, disgusting strangers.
translated: 妈妈教我不要搭理讨厌、猥琐、恶心的陌生人。
